note.note-paragraph:
The following IPC groups are not in the CPC scheme. The subject matter for these IPC groups is classified in the following CPC groups:
E21D13/02 covered by E21D13/00
E21D13/04 covered by E21D13/00
E21D15/582 covered by E21D15/58
E21D15/59 covered by E21D15/44, E21D15/58
E21D17/022 covered by E21D17/02
E21D17/05 covered by E21D17/0206, E21D17/04
E21D17/054 covered by E21D17/04
E21D19/06 covered by E21D19/02, E21D19/04
In this subclass non-limiting references (in the sense of paragraph 39 of the Guide to the IPC) may still be displayed in the scheme.
